message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.DS, cs.NI. 

The paper discusses security challenges in grid computing applications, specifically focusing on authentication. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also proposes a new authentication protocol, which involves splitting the password and storing it in different servers, which relates to software engineering (cs.SE) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the use of grid resources, which falls under the category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
